definition: fate/predestination/divinatory art
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
divination based on the eight characters of one's birth date
divination/divinatory art
numerology

sentences.english: The idea of bringing revolution to the countryside had turned out to be a fantasy.
sentences.chinese: 改造农村的革命理想成了虚妄的幻想。

sentences.english: What is Sacred Geometry in Mystical Numerology?
sentences.chinese: 在神秘的命理是什么神圣几何？。

sentences.english: What is Kabbalah in Mystical Numerology?
sentences.chinese: 什么是在神秘的命理卡巴拉？。

sentences.english: That is, one feels that everything that happens is destiny's way of reaching its ultimate purpose, and so should be considered good.
sentences.chinese: 也即，他觉得万事皆择其命理之道而行之，故而为善。

definition: divination based on the eight characters of one's birth date
divination/divinatory art
the character 8 or 八/birthdate characters used in fortune-telling
to alter one's fate/to improve one's luck (e.g. by changing one's name or phone number)
natal chart (astrology)
one's fortune (in astrology)
feng shui/geomancy
to have one's fortune read/system of fortune telling based on a person's date and time of birth, according to 干支 (sexagenary cycle)
birth year as designated by animal symbols (mouse, ox, tiger etc)
horoscope/one's fortune
good and bad luck (in astrology)
Zi Wei Dou Shu, a form of Chinese fortune-telling
casting a couple's fortune based on their bithdates (old)
one's birth data for astrological purposes, combined from year, month, day, hour, heavenly trunk and earthly branch
colloquial term for 生肖[sheng1 xiao4] the animals associated with the years of a 12-year cycle
palmistry/features of a palm (in palmistry)
